-e ---

# 𒁰 𔑳 𔑴 visually

𒁰 <> 𒄊 <> 𒊊

𒁰 ≈ 𒀸𒋙𒋙𒐺𒋙𒋙 ≈ 𒂗𒐺𒋙𒋙 ≈ 𒁱 durahₓ 𒎙 𒍦 𒋗 𒌇

𒁱 𐀁𐀬𐀲𐀨 e-ru-ta-ra ἐρυθρός eruthrós “red” "deer"

𓃴 𓄛 deer 𒁰 DARA3 ⇔ 𒁯 DAR3 ⇔ 𒁱 DARA4 ⇔ 𓂧 𓈙 𓂋 Rotwild

𒁰 DARA3 deer, wild goat, ibex 𓃙 𓃶 𓃵 𓄚

𒁰 durah ‘fallow deer’ PIE *(d)¿ork-ah2 ‘deer’ or ‘gazelle’ 𓃴

⇔ verb *derc- ‘see, look, gaze’ ⇔ eyen gazelle

Greek forms zorks and zorkás

𒈦𒆕 maš-da₃ 𒈧𒆕 maš₂da₃ mašda 𓄟 𓋴 𓁒 𓃴 gazelle calf <>

𒈧𒁰 maš₂tarah mašdara young wild goat?
